title: China Starts Probes Targeting US Semiconductor Sector
description: China launched two investigations targeting the US semiconductor sector ahead of planned talks between the two nations on trade and other issues.

title: Investors Bet $235 Million on Bringing AI to Scientific Research
description: Lila Sciences, which uses AI to develop novel drugs and materials, has received fresh funding led by Collective Global and Braidwell.

title: UK, US to Sign ‘Ground-Breaking’ Tech Deal During Trump’s Visit
description: The UK is poised to sign a “ground-breaking tech agreement” with the US during President Donald Trump’s state visit to Britain next week, according to the UK government.
